FuncDef: The display local-bill configuration command displays the configurations of the local bill transfer function.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The device allows the generation and storage of local bills to prevent bill loss if a RADIUS accounting server fails. To check the configurations of the local bill transfer function, run the display local-bill configuration command. The command output includes:
Transfer mode of bills in the local bill poolInterval at which bills in the local bill pool are transferredMode of transferring bills in the CF cardInterval at which bills in the CF card are transferredIP address of a bill serverName of the file used to store bills on a bill server, excluding a suffixUser name and port number used to set up an SFTP session with a bill server

Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
